metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33900 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: While investigating DIRSTUDIO-1219 it was noticed that configured StartTLS encryption was not applied when any SASL authentication mechanism (DIGEST-MD5, GSSAPI) was used. While investigating DIRSTUDIO-1220 it was noticed that any configured SASL confidentiality layer was not applied. This issue affects Apache Directory Studio version 2.0.0.v20210213-M16 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: apache-directory-server package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
